name: Kangaroo Kicker
description:
Fast-paced fighting game. Currently up to 4 players using keyboard controls with 4 bots.

This is an old project of mine from 2019, if people are interested in this, I'd happily add more features. Let me know what you think!

Controls:

PlayerLeftRightJump1ADW2🡠🡢🡩3JLI4numpad 4numpad 6numpad 8
